levels.Ⅰ:
:instant: Your selected [unit](../units/index.md) gains +1 :attack:

— OR —

:instant: Your selected [unit](../units/index.md) gains +1 :defense:

This effect doubles for the [Efreet unit](../units/efreet.md).
levels.Ⅳ: :ongoing: Until the end of Combat, when your selected [unit](../units/index.md) is attacked by a :unit_ground: or :unit_flying: [unit](../units/index.md), the attacker takes 1 :damage:.
levels.Ⅵ:
:ongoing: Until the end of Combat, when your selected [unit](../units/index.md) is attacked by a :unit_ground: or :unit_flying: [unit](../units/index.md), the attacker takes 1 :damage:.

This effect doubles for the [Efreet unit](../units/efreet.md).
